name: Castllistics
description:
This is made for a low-effort game jam. Simple 'angry birds' styled physics, hold right mouse button down to angle (elevation), and left mouse button down for powder (power).

Low Eff Game Design Document

  • (castle + ballistics)
  • Castllistics - launching cannon balls at castle bricks to knock down
  • Every 5 shots you get an extra ball
  • The balls compound as your shots increase
  • Quick study in physics
  • Never ends until you are done or it crashes due to too many balls
